subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the ActionSheet UI component.

subMembers.name: cancelText
subMembers.description: The text displayed in the button that closes the action sheet.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.type: String | Array<String, dxActionSheetItem, any> | Store | DataSource | DataSource_Options | null

subMembers.name: showCancelButton
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to display the **Cancel** button in action sheet.

subMembers.name: showTitle
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the title of the action sheet is visible.

subMembers.name: target
subMembers.description: Specifies the element the action sheet popover points at. Applies only if [usePopover] is **true**.

subMembers.name: title
subMembers.description: The title of the action sheet.

subMembers.name: usePopover
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to show the action sheet within a [Popover] UI component.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: A Boolean value specifying whether or not the ActionSheet UI component is visible.

properties.name: dxActionSheet
properties.description: The ActionSheet UI component is a sheet containing a set of buttons located one under the other. These buttons usually represent several choices relating to a single task.

Methods.name: toggle(showing)
Methods.description: Shows or hides the UI component depending on the argument.

Events.name: onCancelClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when the **Cancel** button is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onItemClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onItemContextMenu
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item is right-clicked or pressed.

Events.name: onItemHold
Events.description: A function that is executed when a collection item has been held for a [specified period].

Events.name: onItemRendered
Events.description: A function that is executed after a collection item is rendered.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: cancelClick
Events.description: Raised when the **Cancel** button is clicked or tapped.

Types.name: CancelClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [cancelClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemContextMenuEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemContextMenu] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemHoldEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemHold] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ItemRenderedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [itemRendered] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.
